TextLibrary.Text: We have its trail! It's headed towards the Elea System.
We have its trail! It's headed towards the Elea System.
I could have told you that - if anybody had thought to ask me.
I could have told you that - if anybody had thought to ask me.
It is trying to escape from the MRI. It would take the most direct route away from their home system on Serpens Prime.
It is trying to escape from the MRI. It would take the most direct route away from their home system on Serpens Prime.
